articles.description: England face India in the first Test at Headingley - follow live scores, radio commentary, video highlights and updates.
articles.title: England vs India LIVE: First Test, day two, Headingley - cricket score, radio, highlights & updates

articles.description: After losing their opening tour game for the first time since 1971, Friday night's 28-24 loss to Argentina leaves Andy Farrell's side with plenty of areas of improvement before they reach Australia.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: Five talking points after Andy Farrell's side begin 2025 tour with Argentina defeat

articles.description: With Florian Wirtz set to join Liverpool for a club-record £100m, BBC Sport look at where the Germany midfielder will play.
articles.title: Florian Wirtz to Liverpool: Mohamed Salah, Luis Diaz, Dominik Szoboszlai, Darwin Nunez - where will German fit?

articles.description: England captain Harry Kane scores one goal and assists another as Bayern Munich beat Boca Juniors to become the first time to progress at the Club World Cup.
articles.title: Club World Cup: Bayern Munich 2-1 Boca Juniors - Harry Kane scores as Germans progress

articles.description: Nicolas Jackson's red card at the Club World Cup has presented new signing Liam Delap with a free run at the starting berth in the Chelsea attack.
articles.title: Chelsea: Nicolas Jackson's 'stupid, stupid, stupid' red card opens door for Liam Delap

articles.description: Weather concerns are taking centre stage at the Fifa Club World Cup after a fourth game was delayed - while a heat wave is expected next week.
articles.title: Fifa Club World Cup: Weather raising major concerns in US tournament

articles.description: Doubts about India's future after the retirements of Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma are laid to rest by Shubman Gill and Yashavi Jaiswal's centuries on day one of the first Test against England.
articles.title: England vs India: Shubman Gill and Yashavi Jaiswal show tourists' future safe after Virat Kohli

articles.description: After impressive starts by teams from Brazil and Argentina, will a team from Brazil or Argentina win the Club World Cup?
articles.title: Club World Cup: Will Southern American side win tournament after impressive wins for Flamengo & Botafogo

articles.description: With almost £200m in transfer fees written off, BBC Sport looks at the lessons Everton need to learn this summer.
articles.title: Everton transfer news: Lessons the Toffees must learn in pivotal summer for David Moyes & Friedkin Group

articles.description: England's Tommy Fleetwood makes two eagles in a second-round 65 to take a share of the lead in the Travelers Championship.
articles.title: Travelers Championship: Fleetwood shares lead, McIlroy four behind
